name: Tossy
description:
First attempt at creating a game, I present to you Tossy, a classic Head or Tail game with the cutest piggy face and tail you'll see today! I hope you'll enjoy. My daughters clearly liked it at first, then got bored after 2 minutes...

Thanks to Deltoid for the free Gold Coins assets,  Allesio Regalbuto for the High Quality Bricks and Walls assets and Yughues for the Free Ground Materials.
